This is data about friendships between members of the French elite.
Download the files and import them into R as a tidygraph tbl_graph.

Node data:
<https://jeremydfoote.com/Communication-and-Social-Networks/exams/r_practice_nodes.csv>\
Edge data:
<https://jeremydfoote.com/Communication-and-Social-Networks/exams/r_practice_edges.csv>

Once you have the data loaded into R, I want you to create a
visualization that shows how friendships relate to the religion that a
person belongs to.

Put the code that you used below, and write a few sentences analyzing
the visualization that you created and explaining what we can learn from
it.
